item.title: Python and R Comparison
item.description: This is a flashback of little me felt trying out statistics and getting the target, but I still feel this little even though I’m about to #adult. Nevertheless, let’s do some coding that anyone can do! R and Python programming transitions… library(reticulate) library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.2.1 ✔ purrr 0.3.3 ## ✔ tibble 2.1.3 ✔ dplyr 0.8.3 ## ✔ tidyr 1.
